com.myronmarston.music
Class MidiNote

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.MidiNote

public class MidiNote
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible to create the Midi events for a note. You should not create Midi note on and note off events on your own; use this class instead.

Field Summary

          The default channel of the note--0.
static int DEFAULT_VELOCITY

Constructor Detail

MidiNote

public MidiNote(int pitch,
                long startTime,
                long duration,
                int channel,
                int velocity)
Constructor. Takes all of the main parameters of a MidiNote.

Parameters:
pitch - the pitch of the note. 60 is middle C
startTime - when the note should start playing, in midi ticks
duration - how long the note should last, in midi ticks
channel - which of the 16 channels (0-15) to place the note on
velocity - the volume of the note, 0-127

MidiNote

public MidiNote(int pitch,
                long startTime,
                long duration,
                int channel)
Constructor. Creates a MidiNote with the default velocity.

Parameters:
pitch - the pitch of the note. 60 is middle C
startTime - when the note should start playing, in midi ticks
duration - how long the note should last, in midi ticks
channel - which of the 16 channels (0-15) to place the note on

MidiNote

public MidiNote(int pitch,
                long startTime,
                long duration)
Constructor. Creates a MidiNote with the default velocity and channel.

Parameters:
pitch - the pitch of the note. 60 is middle C
startTime - when the note should start playing, in midi ticks
duration - how long the note should last, in midi ticks

MidiNote

public MidiNote()
Default Constructor. You should use the field setters to provide values for each parameter.

getNoteOnEvent

public javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent getNoteOnEvent()
                                          throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
Gets the note on event for this note. This must be added to the Midi track before the note off event.

Returns:
the note on event
Throws:
javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - if there is something invalid about the midi data

getNoteOffEvent

public javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent getNoteOffEvent()
                                           throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
Gets the note off event for this note. This must be added to the Midi track after the note on event.

Returns:
the note off event
Throws:
javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - if there is something invalid about the midi data

getNoteEnd

public long getNoteEnd()
Gets the time, in midi ticks, when this note will end.

Returns:
the start time plus the duration of the note
